question: League of Legends: Top Esports vs. Invictus Gaming
description:
Top Esports and Invictus Gaming are scheduled to play each other in the League of Legends LPL League on July 19, 2025.

This market will resolve to “Top Esports” if Top Esports wins against Invictus Gaming in their matchup of the LPL League.

This market will resolve to “Invictus Gaming” if Invictus Gaming wins against Top Esports in their matchup of the LPL League.

If the match ends in a tie, is canceled, or delayed beyond July 30, 2025, this market will resolve to 50‑50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from parascore (https://www.parascore.com/).

question: Giants vs. Blue Jays
description:
In the upcoming MLB game, scheduled for July 19 at 3:07PM ET:
If the San Francisco Giants win, the market will resolve to “Giants”.
If the Toronto Blue Jays win, the market will resolve to “Blue Jays”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.
To know when a postponed game will be played, please check the home team's schedule on MLB.com for the listed team and look for the game described as a makeup game.

question: Will the price of Bitcoin be less than $116K on July 20 at 5PM ET?
description:
This market will resolve according to the final "Close" price of the Binance 1 minute candle for BTC/USDT on the time and date specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the BTC/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

If the reported value falls exactly between two brackets, then this market will resolve to the higher range bracket.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTC/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: League of Legends: AG.AL vs. Gen.G
description:
AG.AL and Gen.G are scheduled to play each other in the League of Legends Esports World Cup on July 20, 2025.

This market will resolve to “AG.AL” if AG.AL wins against Gen.G in their matchup of the LoL Esports World Cup.

This market will resolve to “Gen.G” if Gen.G wins against AG.AL in their matchup of the LoL Esports World Cup.

If the match ends in a tie, is canceled, or delayed beyond July 30, 2025, this market will resolve to 50‑50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from Esports World Cup (https://esportsworldcup.com/en/competitions/league-of-legends).
